title: Tom Brady retires; Why Burrow is loved; Can Bears support Fields? Will McDaniels succeed in Las Vegas? Brian Daboll
itunes:title: Tom Brady retires; Why Burrow is loved; Can Bears support Fields? Will McDaniels succeed in Las Vegas? Brian Daboll
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Hall of Famer Cris Carter react to the breaking news announced by Tom Brady that he's officially retiring from the NFL. Then they share their thoughts on why everybody is fascinated with Joe Burrow and how Justin Fields fits in with the new look Chicago Bears front office. They finish up discussing what will make Josh McDaniels successful with the Las Vegas Raiders and they're joined by New York Giants head coach Brian Daboll and he shares his thoughts on Daniel Jones, Josh Allen, and his expectation as the head coach for the Giants.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
